info.title: NovaDB Index API
info.description: An API to perform search actions on NovaDB index data

post.summary: Get the number of comments that match a search filter
Get occurrences of fields of comments that match a (possible empty) search filter
Get the number of objects that match a search filter
Get occurrences of fields of objects that match a search filter
Get work item occurrences per branch

Get the number of objects with XML values that contain links to one
of the objects requested.
Get a list of suggestions for a search pattern that may be used for type-ahead
Get the number of objects that match a search filter

CommentCountResult.description: The result for a count search

changeTrackingTimestamp.description: The change tracking timestamp of the comment index

CommentCountRequest.description: Request object for count of comment

minChangeTrackingTimestamp.description: The minimum change tracking timestamp of the index

maxWaitTime.description: The maximum time to wait for an index update (defaults to IndexApiOptions.DefaultWaitTime)

searchPhrase.description: A user-defined search phrase, if any

objectTypes.description: A list of object types. If the list is null or empty, the search is not restrict by object type

CommentOccurrencesResult.description: The result for an comment occurrence request

changeTrackingTimestamp.description: The change tracking timestamp of the comment index

userOccurrences.description: Occurrences of users that created a comment

mentionedUsersOccurrences.description: Occurrences of the mentioned users of comments

objectTypeOccurrences.description: Occurrences of object types of comments

nullOccurrences.description: The number of items that do not have a value

notNullOccurrences.description: The number of items that have a value

more.description: True, if there are more value occurrences. Currently limited by the 'page.take' parameter

valueOccurrences.description: List of values and their occurrence counters. The list is sorted by value by default.

value.description: The value. This is either a string, number or boolean, depending on the attributes data type.

count.description: Number of objects with this value

CommentOccurrencesRequest.description: Request comments for occurrences of fields

minChangeTrackingTimestamp.description: The minimum change tracking timestamp of the index

maxWaitTime.description: The maximum time to wait for a comment index update (defaults to IndexApiOptions.DefaultWaitTime)

getUserOccurrences.description: Get occurrences for the user field

getMentionedUsersOccurrences.description: Get occurrences for the mentionedUsers field

getObjectTypeOccurrences.description: Get occurrences for the objectType field

skip.description: Skip the first N documents of the search result (used for paging, default: 0)

take.description: The number of top documents. A value <=0 returns all documents found (the default)

changeTrackingTimestamp.description: The change tracking timestamp of the comment index

more.description: True, if there are more items to search for, false otherwise.

modified.description: Get or set database column COM_MODIFIED

objectType.description: The object type of the referred object

summary.description:
A single line text summary with a maximum length of 64 characters.
If there is more content, a horizontal ellipsis character (U+2026) is appended.

minChangeTrackingTimestamp.description: The minimum change tracking timestamp of the index

maxWaitTime.description: The maximum time to wait for an index update (defaults to IndexApiOptions.DefaultWaitTime)

CommentField.description: Comment field enumeration, used for sorting

ObjectCountResult.description: The result for a count search

changeTrackingVersion.description: The change tracking version of the object or comment index

ObjectCountRequest.description: Request object for count of objects

minChangeTrackingVersion.description: The minimum change tracking version of the object index

maxWaitTime.description: The maximum time to wait for an object index update (defaults to IndexApiOptions.DefaultWaitTime)

uiLanguage.description:
The current UI language, used to select the DisplayName (English, by
default)

hasLocalValues.description: Fetch object(s) that have changes on the current branch

hasDisplayName.description: Fetch object(s) that have a display name set explicitly

searchPhrase.description: A user-defined search phrase, if any

quickSearchAttributes.description:
Attribute Id, Language Id and Variant Id combination of
QuickSearchAttributeRefs

objectTypeIds.description: The list of object type ids, if any

objectIds.description: The list of object ids, if any

filters.description: The list of Object Filter(s), if any

deleted.description: Fetch deleted, not deleted or all objects.

modifiedSince.description: Fetch objects that have been modified since this UTC timestamp

QuickSearchScopedAttributeKey.description: Key for a quick search scoped attribute

value.description:
The value as string.
For DataTime values call DateTime.ToString("o") to create a round-trip representation, for other types call Convert.ToString(value, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture).

ObjectOccurrencesResult.description: The result for an object occurrence request

changeTrackingVersion.description: The change tracking version of the object index

modifiedByOccurrences.description: Occurrences of users that modified an object

ObjectOccurrencesRequest.description: Request objects for occurrences of fields

minChangeTrackingVersion.description: The minimum change tracking version of the object index

maxWaitTime.description: The maximum time to wait for an object index update (defaults to IndexApiOptions.DefaultWaitTime)

getModifiedByOccurrences.description: Get occurrences for the modifiedBy field

getTypeOccurrences.description: Get occurrences for the type field

getDeletedOccurrences.description: Get occurrences for the deleted field

WorkItemOccurrencesResult.description: The result for a work item occurrences request

changeTrackingVersion.description: The change tracking version of the object index

branchOccurrences.description: Occurrences of work items per branch

WorkItemOccurrencesRequest.description: Request work item occurrences per branch

minChangeTrackingVersion.description: The minimum change tracking version of the object index

maxWaitTime.description: The maximum time to wait for an object index update (defaults to IndexApiOptions.DefaultWaitTime)

changeTrackingVersion.description: The change tracking version of the object index

more.description: True, if there are more items to search for, false otherwise.

displayName.description:
The display name of the object for the requested language.
If HasDisplayName is false, the name is "Object {id}"

modifiedBy.description: The user who modified this object on the current branch

modified.description: The timestamp when this object has been modified on the current branch

deleted.description: True, if the object is deleted on the current branch, false otherwise

hasDisplayName.description: True, if the object has a display name set explicitly, false otherwise

sortBy.description: The list of sort criteria, if any

minChangeTrackingVersion.description: The minimum change tracking version of the object index

maxWaitTime.description: The maximum time to wait for an object index update (defaults to IndexApiOptions.DefaultWaitTime)

ObjectXmlLinkCountRequest.description: Request for getting the number of objects with XML values that contain links

objectIds.description: The list of Object Ids that are referred to

minChangeTrackingVersion.description: The minimum change tracking version of the object index

maxWaitTime.description: The maximum time to wait for an object index update (defaults to IndexApiOptions.DefaultWaitTime)

changeTrackingVersion.description: The change tracking version of the object index

Suggestion.description: A suggestion that may be used for type-ahead support

value.description: The suggested search pattern. This is a lowercase string, because text content is indexed lowercase.

count.description: The number of documents that match the suggested search pattern

length.description: The length of the suggested suffix of Value

suggestDisplayName.description: Create suggestions from the display name

suggestAttributes.description: The scoped attributes to create suggestions for

take.description: Take this number of items. Must be in the range 1..1000. Default: 10

sortByValue.description: If true, suggestions are sorted by value and not by count

analyze.description: If true, the search pattern is analyzed, otherwise it must occur as a prefix. Default: true.

fuzzy.description: If true, the last search term is used as a fuzzy pattern, not as a prefix.

fuzzyMinSimilarity.description: Minimum similarity for fuzzy search. The default value is 0.5. If fuzzy=false, this value is ignored

fuzzyPrefixLength.description: The prefix length for fuzzy search. The default value is 0. If fuzzy=false, this value is ignored

minChangeTrackingVersion.description: The minimum change tracking version of the object index

maxWaitTime.description: The maximum time to wait for an object index update (defaults to IndexApiOptions.DefaultWaitTime)

SuggestionsScopedAttributeKey.description: Key for a scoped attribute to provide suggestions

indexes.description: The sorted list of indexes of the provided strings that match the query

useOrOperator.description: Use the OR operator instead of AND if the query expression contains multiple terms.

strings.description: The list of strings to match
